newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia court acquits Elliott of fraud.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia court acquits Elliott of fraud.

text.p: The Supreme Court of Victoria on Thursday acquitted former Elders IXL chief executive John Elliott and three co-accused of charges that they defrauded the group of A$66.5 million.

Judge Frank Vincent announced the acquittal after the prosecution told the court it would lead no evidence against the four accused because of an earlier court ruling against the admissability of much of the prosecution case.
"In consequence a verdict of not guilty should be entered into the record," Judge Vincent said after hearing the prosecution had withdrawn its case.
